original_text:
Deadly 5
Quattro brutti ceffi
Billy the Bull, Eliza Ryder, Irene Bullseye e El Fuego non sono i personaggi di un film di Sergio Leone, ma i protagonisti di Deadly 5, la nuova slot Push Gaming che farà innamorare gli appassionati del genere western.
Una grafica spettacolare, ricca di dettagli, ci proietta subito all’interno del tema. La griglia si trova al centro di un tipico villaggio western, con le strade polverose, un cactus, un barile di legno a cui è fissato un paio di manette e un saloon. Ogni Spin è accompagnato da una musica epica che ricorda molto da vicino i pezzi che Ennio Morricone ha regalato a capolavori del cinema come Il Buono, il Brutto e il Cattivo.
Un RTP fuorilegge
La Push Gaming ha optato per una griglia tradizionale a 5 rulli e 3 righe su cui troviamo le nostre 20 linee di pagamento fisse. Il costo di ogni Spin ha un’ottima forbice, con la puntata minima che parte da 0,10 € sino a raggiungere 100 €. Si vince creando combo di simboli identici a partire dal ruolo di destra e procedendo verso sinistra. La volatilità di Deadly 5 è media, ciò vuol dire che tra il numero di giri eseguiti e importi vinti c’è un ottimo equilibrio. Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è davvero sbalorditivo, attestandosi al 96,39%.
Una taglia per ogni criminale
AI simboli di Deadly 5 possono essere suddivisi in due grandi gruppi: basso livello e alto livello. Al primo gruppo appartengono il ferro di cavallo, gli stivali, la fiaschetta di Whisky e la colt, nel secondo troviamo invece i 4 fuorilegge.
Il distintivo dello sceriffo è il nostro Wild, sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter e soprattutto è il simbolo di maggior valore, visto che paga sino a 250x la scommessa.
La cassaforte è invece lo Scatter, con 3, 4 o 5 simboli si ha diritto ai Free Spins:

3 Scatter assegna 10 giri gratuiti e moltiplica per 3 la scommessa
4 Scatter assegna 15 giri gratuiti e moltiplica per 10 al scommessa
5 Scatter assegna 20 giri gratuiti e moltiplica per 50 la scommessa

Nella funzione Bonus vedremo apparire sulla griglia un Wild esteso e sopra ogni rullo il poster di uno dei fuorilegge. Se il simbolo di un bandito cade sotto il suo poster, allora si trasformerà in Wild esteso.

Domande Frequenti 
Il valore RTP di 3 Deadly 5 è davvero così buono?

Il ritorno teorico al giocatore pari al 96,39% è oltre la media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot, che si attestano sul 95%.



Posso giocare solo su pc?

No, Deadly 5 è disponibile anche per smartphone e tablet



Ci sono i giri automatici?

No, non è presente questa funzione

raw_translation.response:
Deadly 5
A bunch of tough guys

Billy the Bull, Eliza Ryder, Irene Bullseye, and El Fuego aren't characters from a Sergio Leone film, but they are the stars of Push Gaming's new slot, Deadly 5, which will charm Western genre enthusiasts. With its spectacular graphics, rich in detail, the game immerses you in its theme right away. The grid is set in the center of a typical Western town, with dusty streets, a cactus, a wooden barrel with a pair of handcuffs, and a saloon. Every spin is accompanied by an epic tune that closely resembles Ennio Morricone's pieces for cinema masterpieces like The Good, the Bad and the Ugly.

An Outlaw RTP

Push Gaming opted for a traditional 5-reel and 3-row grid, on which we find our 20 fixed pay lines. The cost of each spin ranges from € 0.10 to € 100, with an excellent cost range. You win by creating combos of identical symbols starting from the rightmost reel and proceeding leftward. Deadly 5's volatility is medium, meaning there is an excellent balance between the number of spins performed and the amounts won. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is astonishing, standing at 96.39%.

A Bounty for Every Criminal

Deadly 5's symbols can be divided into two significant groups: low-level and high-level. The first group includes a horseshoe, boots, a whiskey flask, and a Colt, while in the second group, we find the four outlaws.

The sheriff's badge is our Wild, which replaces all symbols except the Scatter, and it's also the most valuable symbol, paying up to 250x the bet.

The safe is the Scatter, and with 3, 4, or 5 symbols you're entitled to Free Spins:

3 Scatter assigns 10 free spins and multiplies the bet by 3
4 Scatter assigns 15 free spins and multiplies the bet by 10
5 Scatter assigns 20 free spins and multiplies the bet by 50

In the Bonus feature, we see an extended Wild appear on the grid, and above each reel is a poster of one of the outlaws. If a bandit symbol falls under their poster, it will transform into an extended Wild.

FAQs

Is Deadly 5's RTP really that good?

With a theoretical return to player of 96.39%, Deadly 5's RTP is higher than the average of most slot games, which typically reaches 95%.

Can I only play on PC?

No, Deadly 5 is also available for smartphones and tablets.

Are there automatic spins?

No, this function is not present.

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Deadly 5 is a newly released online slot game by Push Gaming that offers players a traditional 5-reel and 3-row layout, with 20 fixed pay lines. Each spin is accompanied by an epic melody that closely resembles Ennio Morricone's masterpiece works. The game is set in the center of a typical Western village with dusty streets, a cactus, a wooden barrel with handcuffs attached, and a saloon. This game is sure to captivate the hearts of Western genre fans with its spectacular graphics and attention to detail.

Pay Lines and Betting Options

In Deadly 5, winning combos are created by matching identical symbols from the rightmost reel and continuing to the left. The game allows for a significant range of bets, with a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum bet of €100. The game's 20 fixed pay lines create more opportunities for players to hit winning combinations.

Volatility and RTP

Deadly 5 has a medium volatility, which means that there is a perfect balance between the number of rounds played and the amounts won. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is an impressive 96.39%, which is above-average compared to most slot games that typically range around 95%. This means that players can expect more payouts on average from this slot game compared to others with lower RTP values.

Symbols and Wilds

The Deadly 5 symbols in this game can be divided into two groups: low-value and high-value. The low-value symbols are the horseshoe, boots, whiskey flask, and colt revolver. In contrast, the four outlaws belong to the high-value group. The sheriff's badge is the wild symbol, which can substitute for all other symbols except for the scatter. It is also the highest paying symbol and can pay up to 250x the wager. This means that players have a better chance of hitting winning combinations with this symbol.

Bonus Features

The safe is the scatter symbol in Deadly 5, and with 3, 4 or 5 symbols, players can enjoy free spins. The Bonus feature includes an extended wild that appears on the grid, and above each reel, a poster of one of the outlaws appears. if the symbol of the bandit falls beneath his poster, it will transform into an extended wild. With 3 scatters, players will receive 10 free spins and multiply the bet by 3. With 4 scatters, players will receive 15 free spins and multiply the bet by 10. With 5 scatters, players will receive 20 free spins and multiply the bet by 50. This means that players have the opportunity to win big with each bonus round.
